title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2918/90 of 8 October 1990 amending Regulation (EEC) No 4128/87 which lays down conditions for the entry of certain types of tabacco falling within subheadings 2401 10 10 to 2401 10 49 and 2401 20 10 to 2401 20 49 of the combined nomenclature
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2918/90
of 8 October 1990
amending Regulation (EEC) No 4128/87 which lays down conditions for the entry of certain types of tobacco falling within subheadings 2401 10 10 to 2401 10 49 and 2401 20 10 to 2401 20 49 of the combined nomenclature
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annex II to Regulation (EEC) No 4128/87 is replaced by the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the 21st day after its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 October 1990.
For the Commission
Henning CHRISTOPHERSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 256, 7. 9. 1987, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 247, 10. 9. 1990, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 387, 31. 12. 1987, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 346, 15. 12. 1988, p. 20.

(1) When the office of an authorized agent is in a place other than that given in column 3 as the place where the main office of the relevant issuing authority is established, the State concerned shall send the name and address of this authorized agent to the Commission of the European Communities, which shall inform the Customs authorities of the Member States thereof.'
